column1: Report 1
This report documents the customer experience and complaint details for the weekly period from 08
June 2024 to 14 June 2024. The case is associated with order ID ORD8001
Karthik Rao for a laptop. During this period
column2: the customer raised a complaint regarding receiving an

column1: incorrect item that did not match the order. The customer review indicated dissatisfaction with the
overall service experience and expressed concerns about communication gaps and delayed
resolution.
The order was assigned to the delivery partner Delhivery. Based on the delivery team's feedback
the issue occurred due to a combination of operational constraints
logistics coordination challenges. The delivery team acknowledged the lapse and confirmed that
corrective measures were discussed internally to avoid similar issues in future deliveries.
The complaint was handled by Amit from Level 1 Support from the customer support team. After
verifying the order and reviewing system logs
column2: the support team proceeded with resolving the issue

column1: with an apology and service coupon. The customer was kept informed through multiple
communication channels
resolution process.
An internal review of this case suggests that the root cause of the issue was linked to process
inefficiencies and limited real-time coordination between delivery operations and customer support.
The incident contributed to increased support workload and had a temporary negative impact on
customer satisfaction metrics for the reporting week. If such issues recur frequently
long-term customer trust and brand perception.
The issue was resolved within the defined service-level agreement
has been scheduled to ensure customer satisfaction. Based on the observations from this case
recommended improvements include enhancing delivery tracking visibility
communication
column2: and implementing proactive customer notifications to minimize future complaints.
